title: Semantic Hierarchy Validation - Hypernymy Task
description: Multiple-choice questions testing understanding of hypernym relationships
instructions: Select the option that represents a hypernym (broader category) of the given word.

questions.prompt_en: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the English word "dog"?
questions.prompt_es: ¿Cuál de las siguientes es un hiperónimo (categoría más amplia) de la palabra española "perro"?
questions.prompt_bilingual: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the Spanish word "perro" (dog)?
questions.explanation: "domestic_animal" is the hypernym; the others are either co-hyponyms, hyponyms, or unrelated terms.

questions.prompt_en: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the English word "canine"?
questions.prompt_es: ¿Cuál de las siguientes es un hiperónimo (categoría más amplia) de la palabra española "cánido"?
questions.prompt_bilingual: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the Spanish word "cánido" (canine)?
questions.explanation: "carnivore" is the hypernym; the others are either co-hyponyms, hyponyms, or unrelated terms.

questions.prompt_en: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the English word "mammal"?
questions.prompt_es: ¿Cuál de las siguientes es un hiperónimo (categoría más amplia) de la palabra española "mamífero"?
questions.prompt_bilingual: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the Spanish word "mamífero" (mammal)?
questions.explanation: "animal_anatomy" is the hypernym; the others are either co-hyponyms, hyponyms, or unrelated terms.

questions.prompt_en: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the English word "carnivore"?
questions.prompt_es: ¿Cuál de las siguientes es un hiperónimo (categoría más amplia) de la palabra española "carnívoro"?
questions.prompt_bilingual: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the Spanish word "carnívoro" (carnivore)?
questions.explanation: "placental" is the hypernym; the others are either co-hyponyms, hyponyms, or unrelated terms.

questions.prompt_en: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the English word "domestic_animal"?
questions.prompt_es: ¿Cuál de las siguientes es un hiperónimo (categoría más amplia) de la palabra española "animal_doméstico"?
questions.prompt_bilingual: Which of the following is a hypernym (broader category) of the Spanish word "animal_doméstico" (domestic_animal)?
questions.explanation: "animal" is the hypernym; the others are either co-hyponyms, hyponyms, or unrelated terms.
